mapper.insert: INSERT INTO keywi.board_products (board_id, product_id, category_id, created_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{productId}, #{categoryId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bp.board_post_id as boardPostId, bp.board_id as boardId, bp.product_id as productId, bp.category_id as categoryId, bp.created_at as createdAt FROM keywi.board_products bp WHERE bp.board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as productName, p.price, p.product_image as imageUrl, p.manufacturer FROM keywi.products p WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT c.category_id as categoryId, c.category_name as categoryName FROM keywi.category c WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryId}
